tool_description: Evaluates course content quality using pedagogical best practices, readability analysis, and content effectiveness metrics.

review_criteria.description: Review criteria: clarity, engagement, accuracy, alignment, accessibility

target_audience.description: Target audience level: beginner, intermediate, advanced, mixed

content_type.description: Type of content being reviewed: lesson, assessment, media, activity

error_messages: Invalid content_id: Specified content does not exist.
Invalid review_criteria: Use clarity, engagement, accuracy, alignment, or accessibility.
Invalid target_audience: Use beginner, intermediate, advanced, or mixed.
Invalid content_type: Use lesson, assessment, media, or activity.
Content not ready: Content must be in completed status for quality review.
usage: Provide content_id, review_criteria array, and target_audience. Optionally specify content_type for more targeted quality evaluation.

criterion_scores.description: Individual scores for each review criterion

readability_level.description: Assessed readability level of the content

quality_status.description: Quality status: excellent, good, needs_improvement, requires_revision
